problem.markdown:
>>1.Moisture which exerts an equilibrium vapor pressure less than that of pure liquid is :<< (x) Bound moisture ( ) Unbound moisture ( ) Equilibrium moisture ( ) Free moisture
>>2. Moisture in excess of the equilibrium moisture is called :<< ( ) Bound moisture (x) Unbound moisture ( ) Equilibrium moisture ( ) Free moisture
>>3.Drying method where the solvent is frozen prior to drying and is then sublimed is :<< ( ) Supercritical drying ( ) Contact drying (x) Convective drying ( ) Freeze drying
